name: Olive Garden Breadsticks
ingredients: 5 ½ cups bread flour Powdered parmesan
4 tablespoons sugar 2 tablespoons instant yeast (saf brand)
1 ½ teaspoons salt 6 tablespoons shortening, softened
1 cube melted butter 2 cups hot tap water
steps: Place dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix dry ingredients until combined. Add shortening. Then pour in
hot tap water. Knead dough until thoroughly mixed. Spray the counter or table top with non-­‐stick
spray. Use vegetable oil to oil hands well. Turn dough out onto greased counter and knead by hand a
few times until dough comes together. This is a soft dough. Shape dough into breadsticks, dip into
melted butter and then powdered parmesan. Cover sheets with a towel and allow to rise 25 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place dough in oven and bake until breadsticks are golden
